thread.title: Our favourite London hotel
thread.title_full: Our favourite London hotel - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ian t
title: Our favourite London hotel
text: We have just returned from one of our many stays at the Amba hotel Charing Cross. The front of house staff are as friendly as ever, the room superb and the little touches mean so much. Thanks for making this stay as comfortable as all our others. Thanks Especially to Miguel. See you all soon.
